appetizers.name: potato wedges
appetizers.description: freshly chopped idaho potatoes that are fried until golden brown and delicously seasoned with cajun style seasoning and served with a side of mouth watering guda cheese dip

appetizers.name: jalepeno avocado chips
appetizers.description: crinkle-cut idaho potatoes that are fried until crispy in avocado oil and beautifly seasoned with salt and jalapeno seasoning

appetizers.name: chicken noodle soupe
appetizers.description: savory chicken noodle soup made with locally sourced vegetables, handmade pasta, homemade chicken broth and free range organic chicken all combined to make a nostalgic soup

cold Sandwiches.name: tuna no crust
cold Sandwiches.description: paying homage to the american classic The Fast and the Furious, this delicious sandwich consists of White Albacore Tuna, Dill Pickles, shredded Lettuce, fresh Tomato and Red Onion on Sourdough with the crust cut off.

cold Sandwiches.name: turkey Jack
cold Sandwiches.description: Roasted Turkey breast, shredded Lettuce, Pepper-jack cheese, fresh roma Tomato, Dill Pickles and a drizzle of signature Spicy Mayo on Sourdough bread.

cold Sandwiches.name: classic BLT
cold Sandwiches.description: This classic is served with freshly grilled Applewood smoked bacon, shredded iceberg lettuce and perfectly ripened tomatoes,

hot Sandwiches.name: The mighty Breakfast
hot Sandwiches.description: A MUST TRY! Everything Bagel stacked with Bacon, turkey sausage, Egg, Cheddar Cheese and fresh pesto

hot Sandwiches.name: spicy Senorita
hot Sandwiches.description: This one is a mean one! Lightly toasted Sourdough, spread with Jalapeno Cream Cheese, layered with Turkey, sliced Tomatoes, Red Onion, Green Peppers, Banana Peppers, and a dash of salt and pepper.

hot Sandwiches.name: Italian Stallion
hot Sandwiches.description: Pit Ham, Salami, Roasted Turkey, Provolone, Lettuce, Tomatoes, Red Onion, Banana Peppers, Italian Dressing with mayonnaise and mustard. Served on a French Roll.

hot Sandwiches.name: Philly
hot Sandwiches.description: The Philly cheesesteak is the real deal. It's grilled fresh to order with tender steak, peppers, onions, and white American cheese served in a beautiful french roll

desserts.name: fudge brownie
desserts.description: the fudge brownie of your dreams

desserts.name: coffe addict
desserts.description: ther perfect cookie for the coffee adict in your life!Itâ€™s strong, stimulating, and simply delish.

drinks.name: fountain drinks
drinks.description: our fountain drinks consist of coke, pepsi, sprite, dr.pepper and of course the most important water

drinks.name: alcoholic beverages
drinks.description: we carry a variety of beers like bud light, coors light, modelo, heineken, and dos x's
